title: riot, when do I get senior member
body: I've been ~~shit~~posting here for a long time, and I was just wondering how many you needed to get senior member? thanks

replies.body: Could be just 1 or 2 more. Keep at it!
༼ つ ◕--◕ ༽つWe are all Molendo smurfs༼ つ ◕--◕ ༽つ
you get it when we invoke the ritual to summon molendo
